**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 253 2.0 --- Mined from rocks that fell from the heavens, adamantine is one of the hardest metals known. It has a shiny, black appearance, and it is prized for its amazing resiliency and ability to hold an incredibly sharp edge. ## Adamantine Items
